xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="string(.)='Change Initiated Job'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="'${JobInstanceID}'" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: BMC-SA-CLA_ITSM_Integration:Poll outbound form: blade response has error but not contained in retryable error:time updated=>

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org" xmlns:urn="CHG_ChangeServiceInterface" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" cdata-section-elements="Change_ProcessInterfaceData " /> <xsl:template match="/"> <soapenv:Envelope> <soapenv:Header> <xsl:element name="urn:AuthenticationInfo"> <xsl:element name="urn:userName">$[username]</xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:password">$[password]</xsl:element> </xsl:element> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <xsl:element name="urn:Change_ProcessInterfaceData"> <xsl:element name="urn:Action"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">ERROR_TIMEOUT</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:TaskID"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${taskID}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:InfrastructureChangeID"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${changeID}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="urn:ChangeWorkInfoNotes"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">${notes}</xsl:text> </xsl:element> </xsl:element> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
